CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Down (In Rehab)") , IMAGE("https://c.cs14.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015c0000000EF8j&oid=00Dc0000001L5mB&lastMod=1369409181000", "Down"), IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "OTM - Ready to List") , IMAGE("https://c.cs14.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015c0000000EF8y&oid=00Dc0000001L5mB&lastMod=1369409063000", "OTM - Ready"), IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "OTM - Active Listing") , IMAGE("https://c.cs14.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015c0000000EF8e&oid=00Dc0000001L5mB&lastMod=1369409366000", "OTM - Active"), IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Leased") , IMAGE("https://c.cs14.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015c0000000EF8o&oid=00Dc0000001L5mB&lastMod=1369408715000", "Leased"), IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "HOLD - Currently Not Leasable") , IMAGE("https://c.cs14.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=015c0000000EF8t&oid=00Dc0000001L5mB&lastMod=1369408593000", "Hold"),
null)))))
CustomField.label: Listing Status Image
